question:
You have lost your student identification card. This has created some problems for you.
Write a letter to the director of student services. In your letter

-advising them of your situation.
-explain how this is affecting you.
-request a new card.
text: My name is Manpreet Kaur and I am a student of commerce department in your institute. I am writing this letter to request you please issue a new identification card. Please allow me to explain my situation.

A Couple of days before I had lost my photo ID. Last Friday when I was travelling by train after finishing my Wallet. I did not realize that time because the train was overcrowded. When I have at home, then I noticed that my wallet has some money and a school card that was not with me. I tried hard to find my student ID Card, However, all effort was useless. It created some problem for me because school annual exams will be started in a few days and it is essential to carry an identification along with roll number slip. Without having it, I could not appear in examinations. So, I request you Please issue a new student ID, so that I can give my exam. I promise you that I will take care of it hereafter.
Thank you in advance. I hope that you will solve my problem as soon as possible.

error_list.error_des: It seems that problem may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
